Title: Game invite
Description:
Hey! Get ready to play with users among the RoGaming Community!

​

Questions.Question: What game will you be playing?
Questions.Example: Please refer to the gaming category in our Community Server for game options
Questions.Name: Game

Questions.Question: Time of play:
Questions.Name: Date
Questions.Example:
Please give a valid format ``HH:MM`` for when you will be starting your play.  

**NOTE:** This time is in the Eastern Standard Timezone (EST), you may not surpass the beginning of your play session after 11:59 PM Today.

Questions.Question: How many robux will you reward attendees?
Questions.Name: Reward
